function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Pandemics leading to persistent increases in inequality","Impact":"Social unrest, lower growth, and higher inequality","Mitigation":"Investment in job retraining programs, social safety nets, and healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"Automation, robotics, and AI","People":"Low-skilled workers, economically disadvantaged individuals","Owner":"Government, international organizations, employers"},{"Description":"Acceleration in robotization due to pandemics","Impact":"Displacement of jobs, increase in inequality through automation","Mitigation":"Investment in education and training for new skills, transitioning to new job sectors","Technologies":"Robotics, AI, and education technology","People":"Workers affected by job displacement","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Contribution of automation to the growing skill premium and rising inequality","Impact":"Widening skill gap, increased income inequality","Mitigation":"Investment in education and skills development, reevaluation of labor market policies","Technologies":"Automation, AI, and skills development platforms","People":"Workers at risk of skill obsolescence","Owner":"Government, employers, educational institutions"}]}
